channel.title: I need help ~
channel.description:
Okay... Here's a few problems with my server I need fixed.
1. I have weapon emotes... but when you log out they stop until you re-equip them. 2. My character design doesn't stay when I log out 3. My ancient magicks don't stay when I log out. You have to keep switching 4. My magic spells hit before the graphic does 5. The players attack things and do damage before they get to them and that's annoying too. Same with using objects like ladders, etc.
I know these are basic problems but I really need help with them. I'm getting my server back up and I'm offering mod and admin spots to [i]good people[/i]. ;)

item.title: I need help ~
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno

@Kitno wrote:

I made this thread this morning and no one has helped…

item.title: I need help ~
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Okay… Here’s a few problems with my server I need fixed.

  1. I have weapon emotes… but when you log out they stop until you re-equip them.
  2. My character design doesn’t stay when I log out
  3. My ancient magicks don’t stay when I log out. You have to keep switching
  4. My magic spells hit before the graphic does
  5. The players attack things and do damage before they get to them and that’s annoying too. Same with using objects like ladders, etc.

I know these are basic problems but I really need help with them. I’m getting my server back up and I’m offering mod and admin spots to good people.

Read full topic
